name: Mark of Mutiny
originalText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

rulings.text: Mark of Mutiny can target any creature, even one that you already control or that is already untapped.
The +1/+1 counter remains on the creature after the control-changing effect ends.

text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
